author: Ryan Browne
title: WhatsApp tightens message forwarding restrictions to combat coronavirus misinformation
description: Facebook's WhatsApp has reduced the amount of chats to which users can share frequently forwarded content to just one at a time.
content:
WhatsApp is tightening its limits on message forwarding even further, in a bid to stem the spread of misinformation amid the coronavirus pandemic.
